attributes.action: hear our prayer - make entrance to cathedrals free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And Jesus cast out the  tax collectors from the temple ! Making museums free was one of the Labour administrations great acheivements, in my opinion, but the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to take this measure of inclusivity and education in our national heritage even further, calling for a cathedrals "get in" not a "get out" !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
